actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 102-271.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 162.
Mr. Waxman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Disability Policy.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program for the prevention of disabilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Silvio O. Conte Disabilities Prevention Act

summary.text: Silvio O. Conte Disabilities Prevention Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants and contracts for the prevention of disabilities and the prevention of secondary conditions resulting from disabilities, including through demonstrations and interventions, surveillances and studies, public education, and training health professionals. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Silvio O. Conte Disabilities Prevention Act
Silvio O. Conte Disabilities Prevention Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program for the prevention of disabilities, and for other purposes.
